msg: (svn_cl__cmd_table): Fit the first line of 'svn help move' into 80 columns.

author: stsp
msg: (svn_cl__cmd_table): In the help text of 'svn move', move explanation of
--revision option to the bottom. It seems odd to describe a deprecated
option before describing what arguments the command is expecting.
